If you're interested in a lighthearted and funny movie with an interesting plot, I would suggest "Hitch" starring Will Smith. The film is about a professional "date doctor" who helps men improve their dating lives, but things get complicated when he falls for his latest client. It's a great blend of comedy and romance with some memorable performances.

On the other hand, if you're looking for something a bit more action-packed and exciting, I would recommend "Divergent". The movie is set in a dystopian future where society is divided into factions based on virtues, and the main character Tris must navigate this dangerous world while uncovering a plot to destroy Divergents. It's an thrilling ride with plenty of twists and turns, and the cast including Shailene Woodley and Theo James is excellent.
